body_html: I ran into a similar issue and also had warning about libtiff earlier in my build log. The solution for me was to conda uninstall libtiff and update my LD_LIBRARY_PATH so that it does NOT include the anaconda lib/ directory (based on the suggestion here: BVLC/caffe#1559 (comment)).
body_text: I ran into a similar issue and also had warning about libtiff earlier in my build log. The solution for me was to conda uninstall libtiff and update my LD_LIBRARY_PATH so that it does NOT include the anaconda lib/ directory (based on the suggestion here: BVLC/caffe#1559 (comment)).
body: I ran into a similar issue and also had warning about libtiff earlier in my build log. The solution for me was to `conda uninstall libtiff` and update my LD_LIBRARY_PATH so that it does NOT include the anaconda lib/ directory (based on the suggestion here: https://github.com/BVLC/caffe/issues/1559#issuecomment-333918840).
